name: American International Industries
description:
American International Industries is the leading manufacturer and distributor of innovative, quality beauty and skin care products for men and women. With thirty years of industry experience, we understand what it takes to be successful in the competitive and ever-changing world of beauty.

Headquartered in Los Angeles, California, we are at the heart of beauty and fashion. Our continued access to the latest trends has given way to fresh and innovative products. Our corporate headquarters occupy approximately 250,000 square feet and are comprised of executive and administrative offices, warehousing and on-site manufacturing and distribution facilities.

Our product lines include Andrea, Ardell, Body Drench, Checi, China Glaze, clean + easy, Clubman, EzFlow, Fright Night, Gena, GiGi, ibd, 'N Rage, Seche, ProLinc, SuperNail, Surgi-Care, Tres Flores, Gelaze, and Youthair to name a few. With nearly 40 brands, our niche products reach all segments of retail, beauty-supply, grocery, boutique and specialty markets in over 140 countries and are sold exclusively through distributors and wholesalers.

American International Industries is committed to creating innovative, market-driven products, providing both the consumer and the beauty professional quality and value.
Each of our product lines possess considerable brand equity and a distinct heritage. Our commitment to quality, value and innovation has led to highly visible, category-leading brands, placing American International Industries at the forefront of the beauty and personal care industries.

name: Benefit Cosmetics
description:
Benefit Cosmetics is the San Francisco-based makeup brand that believes laughter is the best cosmetic. Benefit is the No. 1 Brow Brand Worldwide and is synonymous with fun, instant beauty solutions. Founded in 1976, the beauty brand has swept the world with one-of-a-kind cult favorite products like Benetint, BADgal BANG Mascara, the POREfessional Face Primer, Hoola Bronzer, Precisely, My Brow Pencil and Gimme Brow+. Benefit is one of the fastest growing prestige beauty brands in the business with locations in 59 countries across 5 continents. With more than 3,000 BrowBars with over 6,000 aestheticians worldwide, Benefit has become the brow destination for both product and service! Benefit is part of the world‚Äôs leading luxury products group, Louis Vuitton Moet Hennessy.
 
At Benefit, everything we do and every product we make is to put a smile on people‚Äôs face. We do this by breaking rules with wit and wisdom, solving problems with courage and creativity and by always trying to make real connections with the people we work with and the customers we touch every day. If you work hard, play hard and love to laugh out loud, you are just what we are looking for to join the Benebabes. To explore how you can be a part of our feel good business, go to https://www.benefitcosmetics.com/en-us/careers

The Mission 
At Benefit, we believe that laughter is the best cosmetic and that makeup doesn‚Äôt have to be serious to look good. We believe that we are not only in the makeup business but in the feelgood business, because when we are laughing & having fun, that‚Äôs when we are at our most beautiful. We create instant beauty solutions that are the perfect storm of innovation, storytelling and creative names & packaging that will put a smile on your face.

name: Boosh Plant-based Brands
description: Today's consumers are looking for delicious plant-based food options. Boosh Food makes it easy with a line of heat ‚Äòn eat single serving bowls and entrees for two.

name: Burt's Bees
description:
Burt's Bees is the #1 dermatologist recommended natural skincare brand, offering clean and consciously-crafted products to work with the skin and uplift the spirit. We believe that nature holds the key to healthy skin, so we create skin care formulas that are packed with powerful, nutrient-rich ingredients for skin that‚Äôs nourished, balanced and beautiful. 

Our formulas reflect evidence-based natural skin care learnings, and are crafted to work with skin‚Äôs natural pace of renewal by nourishing emerging cells and supporting the hydro-lipid barrier. Our nutrient-rich ingredients deliver vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, essential fatty acids, and other phytonutrients to address specific skin care concerns. Formulas are over 95% Natural Origin, with no animal testing, responsible sourcing, and recyclable packaging. 

As a company, Burt‚Äôs Bees operates with a triple bottom line - people, profit, planet - because you simply can‚Äôt have one without the other two. We actively nurture our employees, our customers, our families, ourselves and our environment. By practicing what we preach, we hope to set an example for others to follow, and help people connect with the wisdom, power and beauty of nature in their daily lives.

name: butter LONDON
description:
We are butter LONDON the bon vivants of beauty...cultured, confident, expertly curated, divinely distinctive, and authentically inclusive.

butter LONDON boldly eschews conventional beauty... we believe playful is beautiful and we encourage you to live a little.

Founded in 2005 by British entrepreneur, Sasha Muir with the help of Nonie Creme, London's premier fashion manicurist, butter LONDON quickly became the world-renowned 3-Free nail lacquer brand with a huge cult following. Today we continue to lead industry innovation with imaginative products, and good-for-you formulations in our expanded colour repertoire for eyes, lip & face using the same ingenious carcinogen-free Crafted with Care approach to formulations. We are high-impact captivating colour without compromise.

Famous for unbridled creativity, self-expression, and unmistakable cheeky Brit wit... we're here to inspire. From our iconic ladylike botanical wallpaper emblazoned with faceted gems, bugs, and skulls to our distinctively charming shade names-think Disco Biscuit and Pink Knickers-if there's one thing you can expect it's the unexpected. 

Here's the clincher... butter LONDON is an American brand. Yep. Infinitely inspired (and a 'lil obsessed) with rebellious British creativity and the allure of LONDON-in all its energizing, eclectic, eccentric, glamorous glory. Doesn't everything sounds better with a British accent? We bring you imaginative London-inspired luxury (so you can skip the 14 hour flight).

By the by, we love demanding darlings who insist on colour without compromise. butter LONDON is luxe you can trust. Only the best for the best, expect nothing less.

We are makeup royalty...and we wear it very well.

name: C'est Moi Beauty
description:
At C‚Äôest Moi, we create clean, gentle and effective products that are game changers for anyone who has delicate, sensitive or congested skin. Your skin is the largest organ you have, and we believe in taking care of it. 
Preserving and nourishing your skin‚Äôs natural barrier with healthy ingredients and effective formulas to keep your skin balanced, calm and clear is what we do best. 

WE BELIEVE IN THE POWER OF:

Discovery.
Self-expression.
Curiosity.
Self-love.

...AND THAT BEAUTY SHOULD BE GOOD FOR YOU.

name: Cargo Cosmetics
description:
For 15 years Cargo Cosmetics has been a staple on the sets of film and television as well as in the makeup bags of women worldwide.  Uncompromised product quality and first-to-market innovations have created a loyal following amongst the world‚Äôs most renowned makeup artists.  By consulting with and listening to the needs of makeup professionals and consumers, Cargo Cosmetics takes their ‚Äúsecret tips‚Äù and turns them into better, easier and smarter products.  From high-definition foundations that create flawless skin but escape the scrutiny of high-def cameras to cutting-edge packaging and expertly coordinated kits that offer step-by-step regimens, Cargo Cosmetics offers a wide breath of color cosmetics and tools that allow every woman to customize her beauty look with confidence and ease.  An industry insider favorite, Cargo Cosmetics has received some of the beauty industry‚Äôs most prestigious awards and accolades. Visit www.Cargocosmetics for additional information and product availability.

Keep up with Cargo Cosmetics..

name: Christian Dior Couture
description:
Welcome to Christian Dior Couture, House of Dreams, House of Talents.

Christian Dior was the designer of dreams. In founding his House in 1947, marked by the revolution of the New Look, he metamorphosed his reveries into wonderful creations. His visionary spirit never ceased to make Clients all over the world feel more beautiful, an inspiration for his successors to this day. 

Christian Dior Couture, the House of Dreams, is recognized for its French heritage & vibrant culture sublimating its unique Savoir-faire and Creativity through empowering "metiers d‚Äôart‚Äù. Our Maison is a destination for sustainable growth & success where we shape the future of our Talents in a positive, authentic & generous environment. We bloom & deliver excellence with passion, determination, courage & optimism to offer meaningful & daring codes.

Rich in exceptional heritage, with a community of more than 8.000 talents, our House embodies Christian Dior‚Äôs ‚ÄúHouse of Talents‚Äù today more than ever.

name: Clinique
description:
Clinique was founded by The Estee Lauder Companies in 1968 as the first dermatologist-created, prestige cosmetic brand. Sold in approximately 140 countries and territories, Clinique's mission today remains what it was from the beginning: to provide the highest quality and most effective products to enhance every skin type and concern, offering products for men and women of all ages and ethnicities.

Our smart approach to beauty resonates around the world. From simple skin routines that bring remarkable results, to the expressive power of makeup, made effortless. We offer customized solutions for all skin types and tones. Why not join us? It‚Äôs rewarding to help others look and feel fabulous.

name: Coty
description: We are one of the world‚Äôs largest beauty companies with an iconic portfolio of brands across fragrance, color cosmetics, and skin and body care.

name: DECIEM | THE ABNORMAL BEAUTY COMPANY
description:
DECIEM is a humble and happy umbrella of good beauty brands like NIOD, Hylamide, and The Ordinary. We‚Äôve been called every good and bad thing you can think of like ‚Äúthe most thrilling thing to happen to skincare‚Äù, and ‚Äúthe hottest beauty company right now‚Äù. 

Over the past year, we‚Äôve sold more than one product every second, opened the doors to our 35th store, and welcomed our 1000th employee. With many products in development, a new 70,000 square-foot HQ to call home, and plans for even further retail expansion, we are excited to do even bigger things in the near future.

DECIEM was founded in 2013 by ‚Äúthe beauty world‚Äôs most exciting disrupter‚Äù, Brandon Truaxe. During a four-month co-op at a skincare lab, he became angry at the lack of passion, transparency, or insight when beauty products were being developed. After selling his first software company, many years later, Brandon‚Äôs frustration at the beauty industry remained and he set off to make a change in the beauty business.

That change is DECIEM and we‚Äôre working really hard to continue Brandon‚Äôs vision for a better world of beauty. Everything we do is of exceptional quality. Today, quality is no longer defined by price points or distribution channels. Quality today means being authentic, being different, being functional, being beautiful, and being sensibly priced, even to the wealthy. And we respect these principles. We choose to serve the educated, the curious, and the intelligent who appreciate our dedication to this very genuine definition of quality.

name: Dr. Hauschka Skin Care, Inc.
description: U.S. marketing and distribution for Dr. Hauschka Skin Care products. Responsible for U.S. wholesale and retail sales, customer service, marketing, merchandising, PR, web / social media, events, education and training on behalf of the pioneering international health & beauty brand.

name: E.L.F. BEAUTY
description:
e.l.f. Beauty, Inc. stands with every eye, lip, face and paw. Celebrating the beauty of every eye, lip and face is fundamental to our DNA. It‚Äôs in our name and inspires us as a company. We are committed to creating a culture internally ‚Äì and in the world around us ‚Äì where all individuals are encouraged to express their truest selves, are empowered to succeed and where we do the right thing for people, the planet and animals.

Our deep commitment to inclusive, accessible, cruelty-free beauty has fueled the success of the e.l.f. Cosmetics brand online and at retail since 2004. With the 2020 acquisition of the pioneering clean-beauty brand W3LL People, and the new lifestyle beauty brand Keys Soulcare created with Alicia Keys, we continue to strategically expand our portfolio with brands that support our purpose and values. Our brands are widely available online, and at leading beauty, mass-market, and natural specialty retailers.

name: e.l.f. Cosmetics Australia
description: e.l.f. Cosmetics is a revolutionary beauty brand that offers women everywhere the freedom to experiment and play to enhance their own unique beauty. At e.l.f., we believe every woman should have access to the best in beauty and that is our mission ‚Äì to make luxurious beauty more accessible.

name: Glossier, Inc.
description:
Glossier is on a mission to give voice through beauty. We do this by building products, growing our community, and making decisions in inclusive, customer-devoted, curious, courageous, and discerning ways. We believe in the power of the individual and see beauty as an incredible conduit for connection. 

Glossier is sold in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Sweden, Denmark, and France. Glossier, Inc. was founded in 2014 by Founder & CEO Emily Weiss, has over 200 employees across three countries, and is building the future beauty company. Join us.

name: Green People Ltd
description:
Established in 1997 by Charlotte V√∏htz to help combat her daughter‚Äôs skin allergies, Green People has been instrumental in pioneering the organic cosmetics industry. Green People offers over 160 award-winning natural and organic skin care products across ranges for women, men, babies and children, and is suitable for those with sensitive skin. Our products are gentle on all skin types, even those prone to eczema and psoriasis.

Based in West Sussex, the business retails throughout the UK in independent health food stores, selected pharmacies, online, and in supermarkets including Ocado. In October 2021, Green People‚Äôs flagship store opened in Horsham, West Sussex. 

Green People is proud to use fairly traded organic ingredients, which are never tested on animals, throughout its product range. Clinically proven plant actives are used across the product range to effectively target a variety of skin concerns, such as mature, sensitive skin and spots. 

Supporting charitable causes is at the heart of Green People‚Äôs ethos with the business donating over 10% of net profits annually to charities such as Ehlers-Danlos Support UK, Born Free and the World Land Trust.

name: Groupe Marcelle
description:
At Groupe Marcelle, we firmly believe that our team is the most important ingredient in our formula for success.

As a major player in the Canadian cosmetic market, Groupe Marcelle employs over 300 employees and offers a wide range of stimulating career opportunities. 

With high quality and excellence standards, Groupe Marcelle offers hypoallergenic skin care products, makeup and accessories for all four brands: Marcelle, Lise Watier, Annabelle and CW Beggs & Sons.

name: Kendo Brands, Inc.
description:
Kendo is the small but mighty force behind your favorite beauty products. A play on the words ‚Äúcan do,‚Äù Kendo is redefining the beauty industry through next-generation products, visionary campaigns and unforgettable retail presence. 


Kendo creates original founder brands, partnering with major faces from fashion and entertainment. The house of brands currently includes KVD Beauty, Fenty Beauty by Rihanna, Fenty Skin, Ole Henriksen Skincare, Bite Beauty, and Lip Lab by Bite. We tell their stories to bring to life the dream products you‚Äôve always wanted, but have never been able to find.

Come grow with us! Since Kendo‚Äôs founding in 2010, we‚Äôve experienced phenomenal growth and accelerated global expansion. We‚Äôre based in San Francisco, but we also operate headquarters in Toronto, London, Paris and Singapore, 
our products are in 27 countries and counting. And, we couldn‚Äôt grow without our people. We embrace entrepreneurial spirit, so the opportunities are endless. 

We believe in six values, our Kendo Kredo. Adhering to these in business, in our interactions with each other, our customers, and our recruitment process, we remain true to our culture and the foundation upon which the house was originally founded.

Entrepreneurial Spirit: We seek creative ways to get things done 

Perseverance: Never, never, never give up

Generosity: The power of giving

Story Telling: Creating authentic stories to inspire

Quality Obsession: Our product quality is a reflection of ourselves

Fun: Work, life & fun are woven from a single thread

Advocacy, Diversity, & Inclusion: We believe in listening with humility and acting with courage. We recognize, seek, and celebrate the power of diversity across the full spectrum of personal identity.

Our Open Jobs.

name: L'Oreal
description:
Leading the world in beauty and pioneering the world of beauty tech; we are 86K employees across 150 countries on five continents. 

Our 36 international brands are divided into four unique Divisions: Luxe, Consumer Products, Active Cosmetics, and Professional Products. Our 36 international brands include Kiehl‚Äôs, Lanc√¥me, Giorgio Armani Beauty, Yves Saint Laurent Beaut√©, Ralph Lauren, Clarisonic, Maybelline New York, Essie, K√©rastase, IT Cosmetics, Prada Beauty, Biotherm, Shu Uemura, Viktor&Rolf, Maison Martin Margiela, Urban Decay, Redken, Vichy, La Roche-Posay, Diesel, Garnier, L‚ÄôOr√©al Paris, and more. 

For more than a century, L‚ÄôOr√©al has devoted itself solely to one business: beauty. We want to bring beauty to all people. Our goal is to win over another one billion consumers around the world by innovating and creating cosmetic and skincare products that meet the infinite diversity of their beauty needs and desires.

That‚Äôs about us‚Ä¶ now what about you? You are driven and up for a challenge! You‚Äôre passionate about putting your best foot forward, but you‚Äôre not afraid to fail either. You love to learn, grow and make an impact on the world. You can be an intern, or at a senior level position, we‚Äôre always looking for new people to join our teams.

If you are ready to take charge of your career and join us, you‚Äôre one click away: https://careers.loreal.com/en_US/content

Interested about our quest to the next billion consumers, follow us here to get the insider scoop on our business, culture, and tips on how to join us to shape the future of beauty.

Freedom to go beyond, that‚Äôs the beauty of L‚ÄôOr√©al.

name: Lotus Herbals Pvt Ltd
description:
Lotus Herbals is India‚Äôs leading natural cosmetics company. 

Based on 5000-year-old science of Ayurveda and combining it with 21st century's technology, we offer a well-researched and robust range of over 500 Skincare, Haircare, Suncare, and Make-up products for the retail and professional markets.

name: LVMH Perfumes & Cosmetics
description: LVMH‚Äôs Perfumes & Cosmetics activities benefit from exceptional dynamism that relies on both the longevity and development of key lines, and on the boldness of new creations. The brands cultivate what makes them unique and is guaranteed to make them stand out for their devotees in a highly competitive global market. The success of the Perfumes & Cosmetics division depends on finding the right balance between major historic Houses such as Parfums Christian Dior, Parfums Givenchy and Guerlain, and young brands with strong potential like Benefit Cosmetics, Fresh and Make Up For Ever‚Ä¶ All are driven by the same values: a quest for excellence, creativity, innovation and perfect mastery of their image.

name: Maia's Mineral Galaxy
description:
Maia‚Äôs Mineral Galaxy‚Äôs products offer you a line of natural mineral makeup that is purely botanicals. Mineral makeup really improves the health of your skin. Mineral cosmetics are what makeup should be:  Truly, 100% Pure, non-synthetic fragrances, no artificial colors or flavors, no synthetic chemicals or any other toxins.

Our mineral cosmetics are loose powders that have no fillers to them.  These powders are actually crushed minerals that have been extracted from the Earth‚Äôs surface. You will never have heavy, oily or cakey feeling with our products.

Our products include mineral foundations, mineral blush, mineral eye shadows, eye and lip pencils made with organic oils and waxes and skin care with pure botanical ingredients. 

Maia‚Äôs Mineral Galaxy is a small family owned business using the highest quality of products to ensure you the best quality. We make products fresh on order basis & deliver them in the shortest possible time. We appreciate and care about our loving customers. For today‚Äôs woman this is the perfect makeup line. Our Mineral Cosmetics are completely natural with no chemicals.

Our products are very versatile, hypo-allergenic with high SPF. We have many shades for different skin colors.

name: MarieNatie Cosmetics
description:
Love Your Makeup, Love MarieNatie

MarieNatie Cosmetics founder, Marie founded MarieNatie Cosmetics based on her love of makeup and everything natural.  Encouraged by the consumers growing awareness of natural cosmetics and concern over what she was putting on (and in her skin), Marie researched, sourced ingredients, tested and re-tested products until she was satisfied she had created the best natural products available. Ingredients were carefully selected and tested to create the MarieNatie Cosmetics natural makeup line and her dedication to present the very best ensures that consumers are getting what they deserve.  She wants all women to love their makeup and to love MarieNatie.

About Marie

A second generation Canadian with a family background in cosmetics packaging and international trade, Marie has travelled across the world to such places as Italy, Hong Kong and New York in order to enhance her knowledge in this industry.  She discovered that many products contain chemicals and was determined to create a line that is free of these harsh ingredients.  Furthermore, she wants to ensure that these products contain ingredients that she is confident in, products that she will use herself and share with her friends and family. After years of researching and testing products, she has developed a makeup line that she is proud to call her own. These products will meet the standards of the modern day women on the go.

name: Markwins Beauty Brands
description:
Since its inception, Markwins Beauty Brands has been setting itself apart from other brands in the cosmetics industry. Markwins was the first to introduce multi-palette compacts to U.S. market and is now a global leader in color cosmetics, cosmetic accessories, and beauty collections.  As the largest privately owned cosmetics company in the U.S., Markwins is recognized as a Top 20 purveyor in the global cosmetic industry.

Markwins has been continuously building a diverse collection of brands since 1984 to cater to and reach consumers of all ages, ethnicities, and skin tones. The Markwins brand portfolio includes wet n wild, Physicians Formula, The Color Workshop, The Color Institute, Black Radiance, POP, Bonne Belle and Lip Smacker, amongst many other internal brands and licensing deals. Markwins brands can be found in over 50,000 retail outlets including department, specialty, mass, drug, and food stores, and are available in more than 60 countries, spanning 6 continents.

name: Markwins Beauty Brands International LTD
description:
Markwins Beauty Brands International LTD is a cosmetics company based out of the UK and Milan, Italy.
Our brands include WetnWild, Physicians Formula, Lorac, LipSmacker and many more.

name: Maybelline Cosmetics
description:
We provide internationally recognized qualifications for proficiency in professional make-up application techniques. 

What makes our qualifications special? 
Our qualifications are aimed specifically at make-up application for make-up artists ‚Äì they are not vague ‚Äòbeauty‚Äô qualifications for therapists or beauticians. We have a modern approach with realistic and contemporary criteria that are relevant to today‚Äôs make-up industry. 

Who do we serve? 
We provide an industry benchmark for make-up artists and those who want to employ make-up artists. To hold a qualification, you must first have achieved a high level of skill in your field, thereby a potential employer or agent can be assured of your talent and credentials. For the qualified make-up artist, we offer a referral resource ‚Äì simply agree to have an email link from our site and potential employers can reach you and you can follow up jobs that are posted on the Jobs Board Who uses our qualifications? 

Most fashion make-up house who employ counter staff would require a recognized independent qualification to show that the employee has the basic level of understanding in hygiene, application and client care. Any professional who wishes to receive insurance for public liability or against loss or damage to equipment such as your make-up kit through BABTAC you must hold a recognized qualification through an independent awarding body.

name: Milani Cosmetics
description:
Inspired by art, diversity and attainability, Los Angeles-based Milani Cosmetics¬Æ is a market leader within the color cosmetics industry, creating prestige quality makeup at an affordable price. The brand is dedicated to providing luxe for all ‚Äì luxury that is inclusive, not exclusive. Milani¬Æ has amassed a devoted multicultural following of consumers including artists, change-makers and forward-thinking creators, also known as Milani Makers‚Ñ¢, and for over 20 years has been devoted to their absolute individuality and freedom to express their authentic selves. All products are proudly cruelty-free and do not contain parabens, phthalates or formaldehyde.
We Are Milani, Luxe for All ‚Ñ¢.

name: Mineral Fusion Natural Brands
description:
BRAND STORY:
Mineral Fusion began as a mineral cosmetics brand in 2007 and has since grown to become the #1 cosmetic brand at natural retailers like Whole Foods and Sprouts. 

The brand is centered around providing clean cosmetics products that don‚Äôt compromise on the quality, reliability, exceptional wear, and confidence-boosting performance that consumers associate with conventional beauty products.

Every product is formulated with skin-nourishing botanicals that are free from harmful ingredients.

We are dedicated to making cosmetics, skin care, body care, hair care, and nail care healthy and confidence-boosting.


OUR GOAL:
Making Beauty Healthy. 

We believe beauty shouldn‚Äôt compromise our health, nor harm the environment.
What we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. 

Mineral Fusion is the clean beauty brand for achieving the looks you want without compromising on the performance you know and love. We prove that makeup free from harmful chemicals is just as effective, confidence-boosting, and vibrant while being better for you and the planet.


OUR FORMULAS:
A beautiful look starts with healthy, radiant skin.

Our products are a fusion of beauty and skin care. All our products are formulated to deliver a better skin experience through lightweight minerals, skin-nourishing botanicals, age-defying antioxidants, rich mineral pigments, and skin-soothing formulas.  

Minerals deliver natural SPF protection, help prevent the signs of aging, and protect the skin from environmental aggressors, while skin-nourishing botanicals moisturize, brighten, and sooth.  

Our formulas focus on correcting flaws, not just covering them up.

name: NYX Professional Makeup
description: NYX Professional Makeup, named after the ancient Greek goddess who ruled the night, uniquely offers a permanent collection of special-occasion makeup in addition to a solid selection of every day basics and on-trend shades.  Rich pigments and high payoff in products is what places NYX Professional Makeup in a class of its own and distinguishes the line as a leader in the massive color cosmetics industry. With origins in the US, NYX Professional Makeup is a global brand available at thousands of retailers including department stores (like Ulta and Urban Outfitters in the US), freestanding shops, and beauty supply stores around the world, as well as on www.nyxcosmetics.com.

name: ORLY International
description:
It all started with Pink. When Jeff Pink founded ORLY International in 1975, he was motivated by a simple idea: to innovate natural nail care. 

For more than 38 years, Jeff Pink and ORLY have pioneered the nail care industry. By creating innovative tools and superior nail products, ORLY provides the medium to produce quality manicures, allowing consumers and salon professionals to express their most colorful desires. ORLY continues to respond to industry needs with a dynamic color palette of over 150 shades that are completely free of DBP, formaldehyde and toluene. From the conception of timeless nail looks, such as the Original French Manicure¬Æ, to cutting-edge nail color, treatments, textures and design, ORLY meets the style needs of women in over 100 countries, with the finest and safest ingredients.

In 2005, Jeff celebrated ORLY‚Äôs 30th anniversary and relocated his expanding company to a brand-new state-of-the-art headquarters just outside of Los Angeles.  The new building includes the company‚Äôs 75,000 sq. ft. corporate offices as well as a warehouse and production facility where ORLY does all of it‚Äôs own product formulating, filling, labeling, packaging, quality control and responsiveness.

name: Pacifica Beauty
description:
Built with compassion for the planet, animals and you. 
Pacifica is the most innovative natural beauty company.  We started the revolution in natural beauty 25 years ago and have remained the leader in the category.  We are committed to using natural ingredients that are skin beneficial, non-toxic, and safe.  All of our products are 100% vegan and cruelty-free and PETA certified.   Our product range includes color cosmetics, skin care, body and perfume.

name: Physicians Formula
description:
Physicians Formula is an innovative cosmetics company operating in the mass market prestige, or ‚Äúmasstige‚Äù, market. Under its Physicians Formula brand name, created in 1937, the Company develops, markets and distributes innovative, premium-priced products for the mass market channel.  Physician Formula‚Äôs products have broad consumer appeal. Physicians Formula differentiates itself by addressing skin imperfections through a problem-solving approach, rather than focusing on changing fashion trends. Currently, Physicians Formula products are sold in stores operated by Wal-Mart, Target, CVS and RiteAid. Physicians Formula‚Äôs products address specific, everyday cosmetics needs and include face powders, bronzers, concealers, blushes, foundations, eye shadows, eye liners, brow makeup and mascaras. Physicians Formula has a loyal and rapidly growing consumer base, and the Physicians Formula brand has one of the highest perceived quality images in the masstige market.

Physicians Formula is sold in the United States, Canada and Australia

In addition to Physicians Formula corporate website, www.PhysiciansFormula.com, Physicians Formula also operates a promotional website, www.MyPFBeauty.com.

name: Revlon Inc.
description: Revlon has developed a long-standing reputation as a color authority and beauty trendsetter in the world of color cosmetics and hair care. Since its breakthrough launch of the first opaque nail enamel in 1932, Revlon has provided consumers with high quality product innovation, performance and sophisticated glamour. In 2016, Revlon acquired the iconic Elizabeth Arden Company and its portfolio of brands, including its leading designer, heritage and celebrity fragrances. Today, Revlon's diversified portfolio of brands is sold in approximately 150 countries around the world in most retail distribution channels, including prestige, salon, mass, and direct to consumer. Revlon is among the leading global beauty companies, with some of the world‚Äôs most iconic and desired brands and product offerings in color cosmetics, skin care, hair care, hair color and fragrances under brands such as Revlon, Revlon Professional, Elizabeth Arden, American Crew, Almay, Cutex, Mitchum, Elizabeth Taylor, Christina Aguilera, Britney Spears, Juicy Couture, Curve, Shawn Mendes and John Varvatos.

name: Sally B's Skin Yummies
description:
Sally B's Skin Yummies blends certified organic and natural ingredients into luxurious personal care and cosmetics products that are both people and planet friendly. Developed by hand in Atlanta, Georgia, all of Sally B's products are naturally nourishing, effective, and most importantly, non-toxic and cruelty-free.

With an ever-growing line of effective and good-for-you products, Sally B‚Äôs Skin Yummies is dedicated to using the highest-quality, most effective ingredients possible. Each product is meticulously hand developed in small batches in order to maintain quality and integrity. Not only does this ensure that the products contain the freshest ingredients possible, but it also affords Sally the luxury of improving upon recipes when new, beneficial ingredients are discovered or become available.

name: Seed Beauty
description:
With a unique combination of insight and foresight into the new world beauty landscape, we are the premier destination for acceleration in the beauty industry, bringing brands and products to consumers faster than anyone else in the world. SEED is reinventing how beauty brands interact with customers and are focused on turning beauty enthusiasts‚Äô dreams into reality through continuous disruption. 
 
With over 65+ years of industry expertise, SEED Beauty‚Äôs fully verticalized business model allows its portfolio of brands to ideate, formulate, develop, test, manufacture, launch and ship products all under the same roof. SEED‚Äôs campus, located in Southern California, spans 15 warehouse-sized buildings, and houses all corporate teams and manufacturing operations. 
 
As a verticalized business, SEED Beauty‚Äôs talented team is comprised of chemists, product developers, designers, creatives, marketers, manufacturing professionals, and engineers.  The diversity of SEED‚Äôs functional expertise, paired with its manufacturing capabilities, sets it apart from the rest in the industry. 
 
SEED Beauty‚Äôs portfolio consists of three award-winning brands: 

‚Ä¢	ColourPop redefines luxury by creating high-quality, luxury makeup products at accessible prices. ColourPop prides itself on being cruelty-free, price accessible, and keeping their customers at the center of everything they do. 

‚Ä¢	Fourth Ray Beauty believes in efficacious, highly concentrated, affordable skincare. Fourth Ray Beauty is committed to developing progressive, efficacious skincare formulas that are 100% cruelty-free, vegan and formulated with high-performing active ingredients and botanicals to deliver optimal results. 

‚Ä¢	SOL Body believes in giving everyone the ability to feel themselves through glowy, bronzey, shimmery body makeup and oils. SOL‚Äôs body-loving products help everyone glow-get-it by highlighting their highlights. All SOL formulas are 100% vegan and cruelty-free.

description:
WE GREW OUT OF AN ACCLAIMED LA PHOTO STUDIO. LED BY FOUNDER AND PHOTOGRAPHER DAVIS FACTOR, THE ENERGY ON SET SHOWED NO SIGNS OF SLOWING DOWN ‚Äî BUT TOUCHUPS ALWAYS KILLED THE VIBE ‚Äî AND THE ORIGINAL SMOOTH & BLUR PRIMER WAS BORN.

TODAY, WE'RE THE #1 CRUELTY-FREE PRIMER BRAND IN THE US, AND WE GO BEYOND THE STUDIO TO CREATE LONG-LASTING, ALWAYS CRUELTY-FREE, PRIMER-POWERED FORMULAS, WHICH ARE DEVELOPED, TESTED, AND VETTED BY OUR HARD-WORKING CREW TO KEEP UP WITH YOU ALL DAY.

name: Stila Cosmetics
description:
Celebrity makeup artist Jeanine Lobell founded Stila in 1994. The Company name is derived from the Italian word "stilare,"‚Äã which means "to pen"‚Äã. Stila believes that makeup should be as individual as each woman's own signature. 

Stila creates products for the eyes, cheeks, lips and face as well as for complexion perfection and multi-use. The Company also sells brushes and accessories. Stila‚Äôs modern, uniquely illustrated and inspiring packaging is made out of recycled materials that are durable as well as distinctive. Stila has also continually sought new ways to teach makeup techniques, either over the Internet or within the product container. 

Today, Stila is known for its modern, sophisticated, non-intimidating approach to beauty. The brand's innovative, multi-tasking formulas, eco-friendly packaging, and fashion-forward colors have cemented its place on must-have lists of top beauty editors around the world. The prestige color brand regularly appears on the pages of magazines like Allure and InStyle, and is also used by top designers during New York fashion week.

name: The Estee Lauder Companies Inc.
description:
The Estee Lauder Companies Inc. is one of the world‚Äôs leading manufacturers and marketers of quality skin care, makeup, fragrance and hair care products. The company‚Äôs products are sold in approximately 150 countries and territories under brand names including: Estee Lauder, Aramis, Clinique, Lab Series, Origins, M¬∑A¬∑C, La Mer, Bobbi Brown, Aveda, Jo Malone London, Bumble and bumble, Darphin Paris, TOM FORD BEAUTY, Smashbox, AERIN Beauty, Le Labo, Editions de Parfums Fr√©d√©ric Malle, GLAMGLOW, KILIAN PARIS, Too Faced, Dr.Jart+, and the DECIEM family of brands, including The Ordinary and NIOD.

To explore our current job openings, go to www.elcompanies.com/

name: TPR Holdings LLC
description:
TPR Holdings LLC (TPR) is a NYC based investor and operator of beauty and consumer brands. TPR‚Äôs target investments include scalable mass and prestige opportunities in health, wellness, beauty and fragrance categories. TPR has also provided transition services for large consumer products companies including Shiseido Cosmetics and Procter & Gamble. 

TPR principals have founded and developed such international brands as ZIRH Men‚Äôs Skincare, John Varvatos Fragrances and French Connection Beauty. TPR owns Cargo Cosmetics, Freeze 24/7 Skin Care, Oscar Blandi Hair Care, Nicole Richie Fragrance and Reem Acra Fragrance. 

Visit www.tprholdings.com for additional information.

name: Well.ca
description:
At Well.ca, we are looking to change the landscape of health and wellness in Canada and we need your help to do it. We believe that Canadians should never have to compromise on the health, wellness, baby and beauty products they choose for themselves and their loved ones ‚Äì so we are empowering them lead healthier and happier lives by delivering wellness on their terms.

We‚Äôre a fast-growing, proudly Canadian company that‚Äôs passionate about our customers, our business, and the products we sell!

So why should you join us?
 
FUEL YOUR PASSION. Be inspired every day to lead a better lifestyle. You‚Äôll constantly discover health & wellness products, information and inspiration.

GROW A COMMUNITY. We are about much more than one-time product-based transactions. We are nurturing a community of engaged employees, customers, and experts alike.

GET THINGS DONE. We are agile and creative problem-solvers.

EMBRACE CHANGE. Things change fast online, so we do too! Be part of making change.  

GET YOUR HANDS DIRTY. We are ego-less, and ready to own whatever job needs to be done.

BE HAPPY & HEALTHY. We‚Äôre seriously ambitious when it comes to helping Canadians be happier and healthier ‚Äì and we practice what we preach.
 
Who do we hire?
 
A+ PLAYERS, WHO ARE ALSO GOOD PEOPLE. We need good people to serve good people, so that‚Äôs who we hire :)
 
Join us! We are always looking for PASSIONATE, CURIOUS, CREATIVE, AND DRIVEN PEOPLE who want to make an impact every day. 

Visit our Careers page to find the role for you in Toronto or Guelph: https://well.ca/careers

name: Almay
description: The company primarily operates in the Consumer Durables industry. Almay was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Chauvigny, France.

name: American International Industries.
description: Manufacturer and distributor of skincare products intended to create brand equity and distinct heritage. The company's products offer a wide variety of eyelash styles as well as include a complete line of soft and hard waxes, pre and post waxing products, and waxing accessories, enabling consumers and beauty professionals with the highest quality, globally rich on-trend, innovative color lacquers, and treatments.

name: Anna Sui Vision
description: Retailer of eyewear products intended to be ahead of the trend. The company retails a variety of designs, styles and types of spectacles, contact lenses, sunglasses, shades and other related products, enabling customers to say stylish and trendy at affordable rates.

name: Benefit Cosmetics
description: Manufacturer of skincare products. The company is engaged in the development and production of cosmetic products such as face-pack, compact, makeup kits and other skincare products

name: Boosh Food (CNQ: VEGI)
description: Boosh Plant-Based Brands Inc operates as a plant-based ready-to-eat food company. It distributes, and sells plant based frozen meals to grocery outlets and independent grocery stores throughout Canada.

name: Burt's Bees
description: Developer of natural personal care products intended to maximize the well-being of users and that of the world around them. The company's products uses minimal processing such as distillation, condensation, extraction distillation, pressure cooking and hydrolysis to maintain the purity of natural ingredients like beeswax, botanical and essential oils, herbs, flowers and minerals, enabling consumers to take care of their skin.

name: Butter (London)
description: Developer of an online payment platform intended to help customers book flights, shop, and spread the cost of holidays with simple installment plans. The company's platform provides flights, hotel booking, and online stores for shopping, and also helps to spread the cost in monthly payments through the mobile application, enabling users to conveniently plan their travel costs and shop under one platform.

name: butter LONDON
description: Provider of cosmetics and beauty products. The company's products enable customers to avail unexpected color and long lasting, high performing beauty products, which are quite trendy at a competitive cost that are formulated without harmful chemicals.

name: C'est Moi
description: Operator of a skincare and performance makeup brand for kids. The company offers facial cleansers, moisturizer, sunscreen, eye shadows, liners, powders, lip glosses, mascaras and nail polishes.

name: Cargo Cosmetics
description: Manufacturer of cosmetic products intended for women. The company specializes in manufacturing cosmetics including color sticks, color pallets, eye shadows, pigment pencils, moisturizers and brushes.

name: Christian Dior (PAR: CDI)
description: Christian Dior is a holding company with full ownership of Christian Dior Couture and a controlling interest in LVMH. Christian Dior Couture sells apparel, leather goods, jewellery, and accessories under various Dior brands. Most sales are through its own retail stores. Through LVMH, the company operates the following business groups: wines and spirits, fashion and leather goods, watches and jewellery, perfumes and cosmetics, and selective retailing. LVMH has dozens of well-known brands throughout its businesses, including Dom Perignon, Hennessy, Louis Vuitton, Fendi, TAG Heuer, and Sephora. The company's revenue is distributed throughout Europe, Asia, and the United States.

name: Clinique
description: Seller of skin care and cosmetics to offer consumers quality beauty with health and wellness in mind. The company's products provide quality and effective products to enhance every skin type and concern, enabling men and women of all ages and ethnicities to get customized solutions for all skin types and tones.

name: ColourPop
description: Provider of an online retail platform intended to sell cosmetic products. The company's platform sells eye shadows, lipstick, compact powder which are available in different shades, enabling customers to have a wide variety of choice.

name: Coty (NYS: COTY)
description: Coty is a global beauty company that sells fragrances, color cosmetics, and skin/body care. The firm licenses brands such as Calvin Klein, Hugo Boss, Gucci, Burberry, and Davidoff for its prestige portfolio. Coty's most popular color cosmetic brands are CoverGirl, Max Factor, Rimmel, Sally Hansen, and Kylie. Coty also holds a minority stake in a salon and retail haircare business, including brands Wella, Clairol, OPI, and GHD. Francois Coty founded the firm in 1904 and it remained private until its 2013 IPO. It had focused on prestige fragrances and nail salon brands until the 2016 acquisition of Procter & Gamble's beauty business. This nearly doubled the firm's revenue base, and launched it into mass-channel cosmetics and professional hair care.

name: Deciem
description: Operator of beauty brands designed to provide personalized skin and hair care to both men and women. The company's beauty brands include dermatologically tested skin and hair care products, men's grooming products, color cosmetics and health supplements made from organic and chemically proven ingredients, enabling customers to find and buy health and wellness products as per individual skin texture and sensitivity.

name: Dr. Hauschka
description: Manufacturer of skincare products based in Hatfield, Massachusetts. The company's product contains no mineral oils, silicones, PEGs and synthetic preservatives and is made from natural ingredients that are organic and biodynamic, providing clients balanced skin health to achieve lasting and radiant beauty.

name: E.L.F. Cosmetics (NYS: ELF)
description: e.l.f. Beauty Inc is a cosmetic company based in the United States. The company offers cosmetic accessories for women which include eyeliner, mascara, false eyelashes, lipstick, the foundation for the face, moisturizer, cleanser, and other tools through its stores and e-commerce channels. The products that the company sells are marketed under the e.l.f. Cosmetics, W3LL PEOPLE and Keys Soulcare brands. It carries out the sales within the US and internationally, out of which maximum revenue is generated from the US.

name: Essie Cosmetics
description: Manufacturer of nail polish and hand care products. The company offers nail colors, nail treatments, lip glosses, nail accessories and spa products. It produces nail polish in 300 different colors and serves approximately 250,000 salons in 101 countries.

name: Fenty Beauty
description: Owner and operator of a cosmetics brand intended to offer various beauty and skin care products. The company's products are made focusing on a wide range of traditionally hard to match skin tones and develop formulas that work for all skin types and pinpointing universal shades and offers darker shades among the 40 different colors addressing a long criticized gap in cosmetic industry, enabling women to buy cosmetics according to their skin tone.

name: Glossier
description: Manufacturer of beauty products intended to offer skincare and makeup kits. The company's personal products include skincare lotions, body lotions, fragrances, and foundation kits, enabling consumers to access a wide range of products inspired by everyday women.

name: Green People
description: Developer of beauty and sensitive skin care products intended to be natural and organic skin care brand in United Kingdom. The company's products contains sustainably-grown plant ingredients that are clinically proven to care for skin enabling it's consumer to avail , balanced skin.

name: Groupe Marcelle
description:
Provider of skin-care and cosmetic products intended for women and men of all ages. The company offers research, development, production and
marketing of hypoallergenic and fragrance-free products, providing customers with safe and high-quality products to maintain their personal hygiene and remain well-groomed.

name: L'Oreal (PAR: OR)
description: L'Oréal, founded in 1909 by Eugene Schueller when he developed the first harmless hair colorant, is the world's largest beauty company. It participates primarily in skincare (40% of 2021 revenue), makeup (21%), haircare (24%), and fragrance (11%). L'Oréal is a global firm, with 32% of its revenue sourced from Europe, 25% from North America, 31% from North Asia, 7% South Asia/Middle East/Africa, and 6% Latin America. The firm sells its products in many channels, including mass retail, drugstores/pharmacies, department stores/perfumeries, hair salons, medi-spas, branded freestanding stores, travel retail, and e-commerce. The firm's top selling brands are Lancôme, Yves Saint Laurent, Maybelline, Kiehl's, L'Oréal Paris, Garnier, and CeraVe.

name: Lotus Herbals
description: Provider of skincare products made for women. The company offers a wide range of beauty products like skincare, anti-aging, skin whitening and makeup, thus providing solutions to customer's skincare problems.

name: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton (PAR: MC)
description: LVMH is a global producer and distributor of luxury goods. It operates six segments: fashion and leather goods, its largest and oldest; watches and jewelry; wines and spirits; perfumes and cosmetics; selective retailing (including Sephora and airport duty-free retailer DFS); and other (including publishing). Higher-profile brands include Louis Vuitton, Bulgari, Fendi, Givenchy, Tag Heuer, Hennessy, Moet & Chandon, Glenmorangie, Sephora, and Benefit. LVMH operates more than 5,000 stores around the globe and is headquartered in Paris.

name: Maybelline
description: Manufacturer of cosmetics, skincare, fragrance and personal care products. The company offers a range of beauty products like mascaras, eye shadow, eyeliner, concealers, lip colors and blushes.

name: Milani Cosmetics
description: Manufacturer of cosmetics and beauty care products. The company's face, lip and eye products are for women of any age, style and skin tones, enabling them to meet their beauty goals.

name: Mineral Fusion Natural Brands
description: Producer of mineral cosmetics created for natural personal care. The company's cosmetics and beauty care products offers a smarter makeup that instantly improves complexion while nourishing the skin all while being appropriate for even the most sensitive skin types enabling its customers with formulations which deliver the uniquely beneficial power of minerals.

name: Mirage Cosmetics
description: Manufacturer and distributor of cosmetics. The company engages in manufacturing of nail polish and face, eye and lip treatment products.

name: NYX Professional Makeup
description: Manufacturer of cosmetics products. The company offers special-occasion makeup in addition to basics makeup shades.

name: Orly International
description: Orly International is a Van Nuys, CA based private company whose line of business is Mfg toilet preparations

name: Pacifica Beauty
description: Manufacturer of natural beauty products dedicated to making clean beauty more accessible to everyone. The company offers a range of products spanning skincare, haircare, cosmetics and fragrance, providing customers with vegan, cruelty-free and plant-powered products at affordable prices.

name: Physicians Formula
description: Manufacturer and distributor of cosmetics and skin care products. The company manufactures facial and eye make-up products. Its products include face powders, bronzers, concealers, blushes, foundations, eye shadows, eye liners, brow makeup and mascaras.

name: Piggy Paint
description: The company primarily operates in the Retail industry. Piggy Paint was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Lowell, AR.

name: Procter & Gamble (Beauty Brands)
description: Provider of beauty care products. The company provides fragrances, makeup, hair salon items and other beauty products.

name: Revlon (NYS: REV)
description: Revlon Inc is a company that is principally engaged in the cosmetics industry. The company's reportable segments include Revlon, Elizabeth Arden, Portfolio and Fragrances. It generates maximum revenue from the Revlon segment. Geographically, it operates in North America, EMEA, Asia, Latin America and the Pacific of which the North America region derives the majority of revenue. Some of the company brands include Revlon, Elizabeth Arden, Almay, Revlon Professional, American Crew, CND, and Mitchum brands. The company distributes and sell its products to large volume retailers, chain drug and food stores, chemist shops, hypermarkets, general merchandise stores, e-commerce sites, television shopping, department stores, professional hair and nail salons, and specialty cosmetic stores.

name: Sally B's Skin Yummies
description: The company primarily operates in the Application Software industry. Sally B's Skin Yummies was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Atlanta, GA.

name: Seed Beauty
description: Provider of brand incubation services intended for beauty industry. The company's services include venture capital, brand incubation, product development, manufacturing and fulfillment, enabling cosmetic industry startups to launch their brand and make it successful.

name: Smashbox Cosmetics
description: Provider of high end cosmetics and beauty products. The company's products include a wide range of cosmetics such as lipsticks, foundations, powders, lip colors, eye shadows, blushes, lip pencils, eyeliner, and others. It also offer special lotions and tints, facial cleansers, brushes, and compacts.

name: Stila Cosmetics
description: Manufacturer of beauty products based in Glendale, California. The company's products include makeup, skincare and hair care products, fragrances, makeup tools and accessories, thereby providing customers with quality and performance-tested products.

name: Suncoat Products
description: Suncoat Products is a Guelph, ON based private company whose line of business is Mfg toilet preparations

name: Well People
description: Manufacturer and retailer of organic makeup and beauty products. The company's premium non-toxic makeup and beauty cosmetics include foundation sticks, concealers, eye shadow powders, mascara and liquid eyeliners are made from all natural and organic ingredients which are retailed through supermarkets as well as its online store, providing consumers with natural products that give flawless coverage and soothing protection.

name: Wet N Wild
description: Operator of water park facility. The company provides amusement and leisure facilities like water slides, water wave pools and several jacuzzis.

name: Zorah Bio Cosmetiques
description: Zorah Bio Cosmetiques is a Montreal, QC based private company whose line of business is Mfg toilet preparations
